thread.title: BRIEF-Equifax Inc Says Mark Begor's Base Salary Is $1.5 Million

title: BRIEF-Equifax Inc Says Mark Begor's Base Salary Is $1.5 Million
text:
March 28, 2018 / 1:30 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Equifax Inc Says Mark Begor's Base Salary Is $1.5 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Equifax Inc: 
* EQUIFAX INC SAYS UNDER EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT WITH MARK BEGOR, BEGORâ€™S BASE SALARY IS $1.5 MILLION - SEC FILING 
* EQUIFAX INC SAYS UNDER EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT WITH MARK BEGOR, BEGOR WILL BE GRANTED AN INITIAL EQUITY AWARD WITH A VALUE OF $7 MILLION 
* EQUIFAX SAYS BEGOR IS ELIGIBLE FOR AN ANNUAL INCENTIVE BONUS OF 100% OF HIS ANNUAL BASE SALARY 
* EQUIFAX INC SAYS UNDER EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT, MARK BEGOR WILL BE AWARDED A ONE-TIME SPECIAL GRANT IN AMOUNT OF $10 MILLION Source text ( bit.ly/2E0zoaf ) Further company coverage:
